In England, in the seven days to 19 February, there were 238,729 new confirmed cases (422.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 12 February, there were 322,705 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 26% (83,976 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 24 February is 15,975,718 (28,250.5 cases per 100,000 population).
